name: VC-Streamer Userbot
description: An Telegram Bot To Stream Videos and Audios in Voice Chat

API_ID.description: Your API ID from https://my.telegram.org or @ScrapperRobot

API_HASH.description: Your API HASH from https://my.teleram.org or @ScrapperRobot

ADMINS.description: Add your telegram ID. (Then others can't use your bot. Seperate by spaces)

CHAT_ID.description: ID of your Channel or Group where the bot will works or stream videos
